title: Maces
content: g damage with this weapon heals the wielder for 1d6 hit points and instills them with an insatiable hunger - they can go Mad if they do not deal damage each turn. Concussive Smash Handmaiden's Mace 1d6 +2 Bludgeoning+1d6 Poison damage Weapon Enchantment +2 Increases the wearer's Strength to 18. The enchantment has no effect if their Strength score is higher without it.
